ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Perhaps that is what Karana asks of you. But Innoruk is the God of Hate and Pain. Pain is real. You can t avoid it. of all the gods, he is the only one
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 20 Aug 1999 AsmodeusDP@... wrote:

> I'm new to this mail list, and thought I would introduce myself with a topic
> to discuss. I've often wondered what exactly it means to be a cleric in
> Norrath. My personal opinion is that we should always be merciful to those
> around us, and help in any way we can. Even if to heal someone we don't even
> know completely depletes our mana. What do you think of this?

Perhaps that is what Karana asks of you.
But Innoruk is the God of Hate and Pain. Pain is real. You can't
avoid it. of all the gods, he is the only one honest with his followers.
He WANTS us killing everything. So why should I use the powers he gives
me on those who do not followhim, and will actively work against him?
